mapper.select: select id,clue_id,clue_editor,clue_status,clue_notes,create_time from se_clue_status where clue_id = #{clueId} order by create_time asc
mapper.insert: insert into se_clue_status (id, clue_id, clue_editor, clue_status, clue_notes) values(#{id}, #{clueId}, #{clueEditor}, #{clueStatus}, #{clueNotes})
mapper.update: update se_clue_status set clue_id = #{clueId}, clue_editor = #{clueEditor}, clue_status = #{clueStatus}, clue_notes = #{clueNotes} where id = #{id}
